title: How to unsubscribe from Liki24
description: Learn how to cancel your Liki24 subscription. This guide provides step-by-step instructions to manage your Liki24 orders and avoid unwanted charges.

web.title: Cancel Your Liki24 Order via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Liki24 order via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Liki24 website for your country (e.g., liki24.it, liki24.nl, liki24.es, liki24.at).
*   Log in to your Liki24 account.
*   Navigate to your order history or account settings.
*   Find the order you wish to cancel.
*   Check the order status to determine if a cancellation fee applies.
*   If the order is cancellable without a fee, proceed with the cancellation.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Contact Liki24 customer support if you encounter any issues or have questions about cancellation fees.

seo_text: Cancel Liki24 subscription, unsubscribe from Liki24, Liki24 cancellation guide, manage Liki24 orders, Liki24 subscription cancellation fees.
